## Introduction
This presentation shows a plot created with Plotly.

## Plot
From the mtcars dataset, a plot of disp and hp is created.
```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
data(mtcars)
data<-mtcars
plot_ly(data=mtcars, x= ~hp, y= ~disp, color=~cyl)
```
